text: Ho hoi Nguoi ve chien loi pham (thu tai chien truong). Hay bao ho: “Chien loi pham đo thuoc ve Allah va Su Gia (cua Allah). Boi the, hay so Allah va giai quyet on thoa (viec tranh chap) giua cac nguoi voi nhau; va neu cac nguoi la nhung nguoi co đuc tin thi hay tuan lenh cua Allah va Su Gia cua Ngai
